document_data.name: Grynwald
document_data.mainbody: '''Grynwald''' was a sailor who worked for the noble [[Seasilver]] family of [[Marsember]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. He served as the first mate of the ''[[Wave Wyvern]]'', the galleass owned by Grand Duke [[Farnig Seasilver]].<ref name='Sent-p120">
document_data.Description: He was tall and slender, with the tan skin and blonde beard that accompanied spending time at sea under the sun.<ref name='Sent-p120" />
document_data.History: Grynwald was aboard the ''Wyvern'' when Lord Farnig and [[Elira Seasilver|Lady Elira]] set sail from [[Marsember]] to [[Elversult]] escaping the [[Shadovar]] invasion of the city. While Lord Farnig was killed,<ref name='Sent-p59"> Grynwald managed to survive the ordeal,<ref name='Sent-p121"> staying aboard with Lady Elira as they presumably sailed to [[Westgate]] to find safe harbor with her family.<ref name='Sent-p132">
